compounddef.title: Configure the mission and CPU specific cFE Application Parameter files

detaileddescription.para: In the cFE source distribution, there are a few cFE Application configuration files. These files exist only as an example of how mission and CPU specific settings can be set for a suite of cFE Applications. There is no requirement by the cFE to have application configuration files.

entry.para: Common cFE Application Message IDs for a CPU.
Common cFE Application Performance IDs for a CPU

detaileddescription.para: Next: Build the cFE Core and cFE Applications Prev: Configure the makefile in each CPU Directory Up To: Configure a Set of cFE Applications for Each CPU
